body: This is still the case. `computes_on_variables` is used here only to inform the interpreter that the _constants_ need to be constructed as variables Variables. `constants_are_variables` is probably a better name.
body_html: This is still the case. computes_on_variables is used here only to inform the interpreter that the constants need to be constructed as variables Variables. constants_are_variables is probably a better name.
body_text: This is still the case. computes_on_variables is used here only to inform the interpreter that the constants need to be constructed as variables Variables. constants_are_variables is probably a better name.
